content: Following is a list of notable [think tanks](/wiki/Think_tank) in Singapore. - Asia Competitiveness Institute - The Centre for Strategic Energy and Resources (CSER) was established in 2022 as an independent think-and-do tank in Singapore with a mission to build enabling ecosystems to accelerate energy transition in Asia. - The [Centre for International Law](/wiki/Centre_for_International_Law) was established in 2009 at the [National University of Singapore](/wiki/National_University_of_Singapore). - [Energy Studies Institute](/wiki/Energy_Studies_Institute) - The [Institute of Policy Studies](/wiki/Institute_of_Policy_Studies_(Singapore)) was established in 1988 and focuses on strategic policy research and discussion. - The [Institute of Southeast Asian Studies](/wiki/Institute_of_Southeast_Asian_Studies) is a regional research institute for the study of social-political, security and [economic trends](/wiki/Economic_indicator) and developments in [Southeast Asia](/wiki/Southeast_Asia). - [Lee Kuan Yew School of Public Policy](/wiki/Lee_Kuan_Yew_School_of_Public_Policy) - [S. Rajaratnam School of International Studies](/wiki/S._Rajaratnam_School_of_International_Studies) - [Singapore Institute of International Affairs](/wiki/Singapore_Institute_of_International_Affairs) - [Singapore International Foundation](/wiki/Singapore_International_Foundation) - Lists portal - Politics portal - Singapore portal - [List of think tanks](/wiki/List_of_think_tanks)
title: List of think tanks in Singapore
